about_the_game:
Starter Bundle

Get a head start by complimenting your tutorial rewards with this high-value Starter Bundle that contains:
  • 5 Starter Decks (one granted by tutorial)
  • 5 Basic Heroes
  • 4 Primal Boosters (one granted by tutorial)
  • 5 Dominion Boosters
  • 5 Nether Boosters
That means you’ll unlock 225 cards! With this bundle, you’ll gain an access to all cabals to find your favorite.

Booster Packs

  • 4x Primal Booster Pack
    These booster packs contain cards from the blue and green cabals of Bearclaw Brotherhood and Danann Covenant.
    New players receive one Primal Booster Pack for free.
  • 5x Dominion Booster Pack
    These booster packs contain cards from the red and yellow cabals of Vril Society and Order of Zahir.
  • 5x Nether Booster Pack
    These booster packs contain cards from the teal and purple cabals of Dragon Enclave and Sons of Osiris.

Starter Decks

  • 5x Starter Deck
Receive five ready-to-play decks: Servants of the Bear, Zahir Apprentices, Vril Mob, Dragon Minions and Acolytes of Osiris.
All decks contain 30 cards with 4 uncommons and 2 rares. See full deck lists inside the game's shop.
New players receive the Danann Faeriefolk starter deck for free.

Heroes

  • 5x Basic Heroes
Unlock 5 basic heroes: Rasputin, Karl Maria Viligut, Franz Tausend, Elder Zhang Guo and Alistair Crowley.
New players unlock Morgana Le Fay for free.

Starter Bundle

Get a head start by complimenting your tutorial rewards with this high-value Starter Bundle that contains:
  • 5 Starter Decks (one granted by tutorial)

That means you’ll unlock 225 cards! With this bundle, you’ll gain an access to all cabals to find your favorite.

    New players receive one Primal Booster Pack for free.

All decks contain 30 cards with 4 uncommons and 2 rares. See full deck lists inside the game's shop.

New players unlock Morgana Le Fay for free.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

name: Cabals: Magic & Battle Cards - Starter Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP SP2+/Windows® Vista/Windows® 7/Windows® 8/Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core™ 2 Duo E6600 (2.4 GHz) or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ (2.6 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT (512 MB) or ATI Radeon HD 4850 (512 MB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
